title: Bio - Carlo Ancelotti
snippet: Carlo Ancelotti is the only coach in history with five UEFA Champions League titles.

title: Ancelotti is now the second coach with the most titles in the history of Real Madrid
snippet: Carlo Ancelotti has extended his legacy at Real Madrid and with 12 titles he is now the second coach with the most trophies in the club's history. The Italian has won his second LaLiga title, adding to the one he won in 2022.

title: List of Real Madrid CF managers - Wikipedia
snippet: The most successful coach with Real Madrid is Carlo Ancelotti, as won 15 titles with the team.
